sentences:
Animal Crossing is a community simulation video game series developed and published by Nintendo , in which the human player lives in a village inhabited by anthropomorphic animals , carrying out various activities including fishing , bug catching , fossil hunting , etc .
The series is notable for its open - ended gameplay and extensive use of the game systems ' internal clock and calendar to simulate real passage of time .
Four Animal Crossing games have been released worldwide , one each for the Nintendo 64 ( enhanced and reissued for the GameCube ) , Nintendo DS , Wii , and the Nintendo 3DS .
A fifth game , for the Nintendo Switch , is scheduled for a 2019 release .
The series has been both critically and commercially successful and has sold over 30 million units worldwide .
Three spin - off games have also been released : ( for Nintendo 3DS ) , ( for mobile phones ) , and ( for Wii U ) .
